New Records: LaMelo Ball scored 25 points, including a 5-for-12 performance from the three-point line, the highest three-point percentage in the game.
The Charlotte Hornets secured their third win of the 2024-25 NBA season, improving to 3-5.
Key Match Events: The game was tied 31-31 in the fourth quarter before the Hornets took the lead for good.
LaMelo Ball made a clutch 27-foot step-back triple and a layup in the final minute to secure the win.
Post-Match Reflections: Charlotte Hornets coach Steve Clifford praised the team's effort and resilience in snapping their three-game skid.
The victory was seen as a crucial step toward the Hornets' championship aspirations.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was described as 'hard-fought' and 'competitive' throughout, with neither team able to pull away early in the fourth quarter.
